name: ALLAWN: Arcade Game
description:
GAMEPLAY : Allawn is a action / arcade trial and error game with rogue-like elements. Survive as long as possible while tons of enemies are chasing you.

GRAPHICS : I chose to use pixel art and geometric figures because I tink it suits the arcade gameplay.

This game represents the future of arcade games on mobile ! With innovative controls
that feels like playing a real arcade !

Features :

- 100+ hours of gameplay
- 40+ Items, including 20 unlockables
- Skill-requiring controls
- Die & Retry
- Cover the floor with the blood of your enemies
- Wave System
- Old school / Arcade Style Graphics
- TONS Of Enemies
- NO ADS

WARNING : This game contains flashing lights which may not be suitable for photosensitive epilepsy
